Chapter 11 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than 5 calendar days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 11/30/2009, Schedules A-J due 11/25/2009. Statement of Financial Affairs due 11/25/2009, Attorney Disclosure Statement due 11/25/2009, Individual Debtor Statement of Current Monthly Income due by 11/25/2009, Payment Advices Declaration Required by 11 USC Section 521(a)(1)(B)(iv) due by 11/25/2009, filed by S. CARY FORRESTER of FORRESTER & WORTH, PLLC on behalf of Nutracea, a California corporation (FORRESTER, S.) (Entered: 11/10/2009)
